naslov: Omiška rivijera, 2 LUX VILLE /PANORAMSKI POGLED MORE -čitaj opis VIDEO (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. NAPOMENA: oglašene slike radi privatnosti prodavatelja su reklamne. Detaljne slike, video vile i okućnice, tlocrte, expose vila šaljemo na upit ! + mogućnost zasebne kupnje susjedne vile identičnog izgleda Arhitektonsko remek djelo koje svojom vizurom odskaču od ustaljenih normi. Prilikom osmišljavanja vila sa posebnom pažnjom se vodilo računa o tome da vile budu izgrađene u skladu sa prirodnim okolišem u koju su uklopljene. Tome svjedoči to da su krovovi ozelenjeni mediteranskim billjem, a na svakom od krovova soba i dnevnih boravaka centralno mjesto zauzima stablo masline koje je zaštitni znak mediteranskog podneblja i načina života. Ako tražite savršeno mjesto za odmor ili život, ne tražite dalje. Prodajemo dvije luksuzne vile u mirnom i lijepom dijelu Omiške rivijere (selo Marušići). - Vila 1. je površine 297m2 na okućnici od 956m2, ima tri spavaće sobe sa kupaonicama, prostrani dnevni boravak, kuhinju, blagovaonicu i terasu... - Vila 2. je površine 298m2 na okućnici od 861m2, ima tri spavaće sobe sa kupaonicama, prostrani dnevni boravak, kuhinju, blagovaonicu i terasu... Potpuno su namještene i opremljene svim modernim brendiranim uređajima i sadržajima. + gradnja 2020.godine + energetska vrijednost A + grijani bazen x 2 (66m2), jacuzzi, saune, teretane, vrt, parking, vinoteke, garaža, punjači za elektična auta, lift... - PRIZEMLJE: garaža 94m2, vinski podrum, natkriveni parking, punionica za električni automobile, strojarnica... - 1.KAT: wellness i spa, teretana, jacuzzi, sauna, dnevni boravak i kuhinja... - 2.KAT: prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom s izlazom na terasu sa bazenom, 3 spavaće sobe s kupaonicama - krovna terasa: ljetna kuhinja s terasom, prostor za druženje... Najveća prednost ovih vila su njihov predivan pogled na more, koji se pruža sa svake etaže. Možete uživati u zalascima sunca, mirisu mora i zvuku valova. Vile su udaljene samo 270 metara od plaže, gdje možete plivati, sunčati se ili se baviti vodenim sportovima. U blizini su i brojni restorani, kafići, trgovine i kulturne znamenitosti... Marušići su jedno od ljepših mjesta na Omiškoj rivijeri, poznato po svojoj bogatoj povijesti, kulturi i prirodi. Marušići su idealno mjesto za odmor ili život, jer nudi razne aktivnosti i sadržaje za sve uzraste i ukuse. eng......................................................... - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + vat of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: the advertised images are advertising for the privacy of the seller. We send detailed pictures, floor plans, expose villas on request! + possibility of separate purchase of a neighboring villa with an identical appearance An architectural masterpiece that, with its vision, jumps out of the established norms. When designing the villas, special care was taken to ensure that the villas are built in harmony with the natural environment in which they are integrated. This is evidenced by the fact that the roofs are green with Mediterranean plants, and on each of the roofs of the rooms and living rooms, the central place is occupied by an olive tree, which is a trademark of the Mediterranean climate and way of life. If you are looking for the perfect place to vacation or live, look no further. We are selling two luxury villas in a quiet and beautiful part of the Omiš Riviera (the village of Marušići). - Villa 1 has an area of 297m2 on a plot of 956m2, has three bedrooms with bathrooms, a spacious living room, kitchen, dining room and terrace... - Villa 2 has an area of 298m2 on a plot of 861m2, has three bedrooms with bathrooms, a spacious living room, kitchen, dining room and terrace... They are fully furnished and equipped with all modern branded appliances and facilities. + construction in 2020 + energy value A + heated pool x 2 (66m2), jacuzzi, saunas, gyms, garden, parking, wine shops, garage, chargers for electric cars, elevator... - GROUND FLOOR: garage 94m2, wine cellar, covered parking, charging station for electric cars, engine room... - 1ST FLOOR: wellness and spa, gym, jacuzzi, sauna, living room and kitchen... - 2ND FLOOR: spacious living room with kitchen and dining room with access to the terrace with pool, 3 bedrooms with bathrooms - roof terrace: summer kitchen with terrace, space for socializing... The biggest advantage of these villas is their wonderful view of the sea, which extends from every floor. You can enjoy the sunsets, the smell of the sea and the sound of the waves. The villas are only 270 meters from the beach, where you can swim, sunbathe or engage in water sports. There are numerous restaurants, cafes, shops and cultural sights nearby... Marušići is one of the most beautiful places on the Omiš Riviera, known for its rich history, culture and nature. Marušići is an ideal place for vacation or life, as it offers various activities and facilities for all ages and tastes. #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
